html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-13022023-12-15FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of auditors and joint auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for a the 2023 fiscal year.
PrecisOrder appointing (1) PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT CORPORATION and its wholly-owned subsidiaries, the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., Canada TMP Finance Ltd., Trans Mountain Corporation, and the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023; and (2) DELOITTE as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Growth Fund Inc., for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing (1) PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT CORPORATION and its wholly-owned subsidiaries, the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., Canada TMP Finance Ltd., Trans Mountain Corporation, and the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023; and (2) DELOITTE as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Growth Fund Inc., for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023.
